attributes.action: Reciprocal visa free access between both the UK and Ukraine.
attributes.background: Ukraine currently gives all EU citizens 90 days worth of visa free access including the UK. After Brexit Ukraine may change this regime and require British citizens a visa to visit. I'm petitioning for reciprocal visa free access between the two nations.

rejection.details: In any case, the UK Government cannot unilaterally grant reciprocal visa arrangements with another country. You could start a new petition calling on the Government to negotiate a specific reciprocal agreement with Ukraine.
